page.title: 06A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: This is a typical school day in my life.I usually awake at 7.30a.m.After washing and dressing I have a quick breakfast and watch Breakfast T.V.At 8.30 I set off on my bike.School begins at 9a.m. Mr. Cooke takes the registers for attendance and dinners and we go to the hall for assembly.We then work at our S.M.P.Maths until play-time.I usually play hopscotch, tick or skipping.Language work and Reading is done until 12p.m.We have lunch and a break till 1p.m.Back in class I do Art or Topic.We might paint or model in card or clay.In Topic we learn more interesting things such as History or about our environment.After a break we have an hour of school left.We sometimes have Games or P.E.or we carry on with Topic or Individual Topic.School ends at 3.30p.m.I might stay for jobs or a Netball practice.
